ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select `main`.`対象事業者ID` AS `対象事業者ID` from (select (case when (`a`.`group_type_id` = 2) then `a`.`order_customer_id` else `a`.`builder_id` end) AS `対象事業者ID` from ((((`t_object_order` `a` join `mp_prod`.`m_group` `b` on((`a`.`group_id` = `b`.`group_id`))) join `m_customer_default` `c` on((`a`.`builder_id` = `c`.`customer_id`))) join `m_order_status` `d` on((`a`.`order_status_id` = `d`.`order_status_id`))) join `t_object_warranty` `e` on((`a`.`latest_warranty_id` = `e`.`warranty_id`))) where ((`a`.`active_flg` = 1) and (`d`.`warranty_confirm_flg` = 1) and (`b`.`warranty_check_unnecessary_flg` = 0) and (`c`.`warranty_check_unnecessary_flg` = 0) and ((`e`.`next_warranty_check_date` <= curdate()) or (`e`.`next_warranty_check_date` is null)))) `main` group by `main`.`対象事業者ID`
